rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with storage and shoe racks.
Eco-friendly living area with natural lighting, energy-efficient windows. Connected to a kitchenette.
Energy-efficient kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage space. Designed for optimal workflow per Vastu guidelines.
Integrated dining area within the living zone, maximizing space and energy efficiency.

openings.description: Reinforced glass door with energy-efficient design, facing the north.
Garage door connecting ground floor to two-car garage. Designed for minimal heat loss and energy efficiency.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with east-facing window for optimal sunlight. Includes a private balcony overlooking a green space.
Additional bedroom with west-facing window and private balcony designed per Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Modern ensuite bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Eco-friendly staircase with energy-efficient LED lighting and safe tread design.

rooms.description: Private gym area designed with eco-friendly equipment and ample ventilation. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for active spaces.
Versatile study area that can serve as an office space. Equipped with natural lighting and ergonomic design features.

openings.description: Balcony access door to private gym and study area for fresh air.
Emergency exit staircase with energy-efficient design and safety features.
